short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Guess a number from one to a hundred! How many turns does it take? Ready to open without any intrusive permissions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is a fun and easy way to play Guess the Number while waiting for something to load, or just as a time passer! This extension requires absolutely no permissions or setup, so you can just click install and you're ready to go!
